message:
🕉️ Om Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

🙏 Under the guidance of **Amrapur Seva Samiti**, a 3-day Yoga Camp 🧘‍♀️

🗓️ **Day 1** – 6 April 2025 (Sunday, Ram Navami)
🧘‍♂️ 30 mins – Yoga Session
🧠 15 mins – Mindfulness Technique

🗓️ **Day 2** – 7 April 2025 (Monday)
🤸‍♀️ Yoga + Activity – 30 mins
🗣️ Discussion Session – 15 mins

🗓️ **Day 3** – 8 April 2025 (Tuesday)
🧘‍♀️ Mindfulness Activity – 15 mins
💬 Feedback & Interaction – 30 mins
🏁 Closing – 5 mins

🕰️ Time: 8:30 AM to 9:15 AM
📍 Location: Shri Amrapur Sthan, Jaipur
📞 Contact: Garima 8209600346, Priyanka 9352618605

🚩 Come and benefit from this divine Yogic practice! 🚩

🕉️ Om Satnam Sakshi | Shri Radha Govind Dev Ji 🕉️

🌹 **Bhav Pravah Hari Naam Sankirtan** 🌹

🎵 **An evening in the name of Shri Ram Ji & Radha Govind Ji** 🎵

🎶 Devotional Bhajans & Celebration Songs 🎶

 With the blessings of Shri Radha Govind Ji, a Hari Naam Sankirtan is being organized in service of cows and to bring joy to the Lord.

🙏 You and your family are cordially invited. Your presence will bring special delight to Shri Thakur Ji.

📜 **Organizer**: Shri Radha Govind Sarkar
📍 **Venue**: Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur
📅 **Date**: April 6, 2025 (Ram Navami)
⏰ **Time**: 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM
📞 **Contact**: +91 9828796894

🙏🏻 Let us all take part in this divine Sankirtan on the auspicious occasion of Shri Ram Janmotsav!
🚩 Jai Gaumata Jai Gopal 🚩

🕉️ Om Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

**Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur**

📜 **Revised Timings**

⏰ **Mangala Darshan** - 6:00 AM
🛐 **Prayer & Satsang** - 7:00 AM to 8:15 AM
✨ **Rest Time** - 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM
🎶 **Bhajan & Satsang** - 5:00 PM to 6:30 PM
🌅 **Sandhya Aarti** - 6:30 PM
😇 **Darshan Timings** - 3:00 PM to 9:00 PM

📌 **Note:**
📵 Please keep mobile phones switched off in the temple premises!
🚪 The main gate will remain closed from **12:00 PM to 3:00 PM** & **9:00 PM to 6:00 AM**.
🙏 Kindly visit for Darshan & Seva only after 6:00 AM!

🕉️ Om Shri Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

📢 Organized by Amarapur Seva Samiti

📌 **Jan Aadhaar & Ayushman Card Camp**

🕘 **Every Sunday, Time: 9 AM to 11 AM**

📍 Location: Amarapur Asthan, Jaipur

📢 All devotees who wish to create or update their Jan Aadhaar or Ayushman Card are requested to attend the camp with the necessary documents!

📱 **Please bring the mobile phone linked to your Aadhaar card!!**

ℹ️ For more information, contact:
📞 Naveen Gurnani – 9509789843, Jaipur

🕉️ Om Satnam Sakhi 🕉️

With the blessings of Mangalmoorti Acharya Satguru Swami Teoonram Ji Maharaj
Organized by Amrapur Seva Samiti

**Free Physiotherapy Camp**

🕘 **Every Sunday, Time: 9 AM to 11 AM**

📍 Location: Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur

Conditions Treated: - Joint Pain - Back Pain - Knee Pain - Neck Pain - Elbow Pain - Paralysis - Sciatica Pain - Sports Injury - Frozen Shoulder - Ligament Injury - Children's Disability - Muscle Strain

📞 For more information, contact:
B.D. Tekwani (General Secretary) ☎ 9785362675
Dr. Shweta Belaramani (BPT. IAFT) ☎ 7597070427
